sections.title: Guides Directory
sections.content: The `04-guides` directory contains user guides, tutorials, how-to documents, and reference materials that help users understand how to use the system. This directory is focused on end-user documentation and practical guidance.

sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: This directory serves as a central location for documentation that guides users in using the system. These documents explain concepts, provide step-by-step instructions, and offer reference information to make the system more accessible. This directory is essential for new users and as a reference for experienced users.

sections.title: Key Documents
sections.content:
- **user-guide.json**: Comprehensive guide for using the system
- **glossary.json**: Definitions of key terms and concepts

Additional documents include:
- Tutorials for specific tasks
- API documentation
- FAQ and troubleshooting guides

sections.title: Related Tags
sections.content:
Common tags for documents in this directory include:
- documentation
- guide
- reference
- glossary
- terminology
- definitions
- standards
- best-practices
